0.1.name: wordpress/unwanted-plugins-remover
0.1.description: With this plugin you can remove unwanted plugins on a WordPress core upgrade process. Unwanted plugins are for example Akismet or Hello Dolly. Both plugins are default values and will be removed on each core upgrade process. You can extend the list with a filter named unwanted_plugins_list.
